column1: Local Foods////I ordered the Banh Mi with tofu instead of pork. It was absolutely amazing. HUGE sandwich first of all. Every bite was perfect. The pickled onions
column3: and fresh jalapenos were wonderful. The bread was perfect. Even the tofu was fantastic! My non-vegetarian boyfriend who does not like tofu took a big bite and LOVED it. I got it with the cauliflower and kale sides. Both were delicious but the kale was just perfect. I wish I had gotten a picture because it was a picture perfect sandwich. I ordered it to go and
column4: despite the place being packed at noon
column5: they had it out in 5 minutes. Ridiculous. I can't wait to go back and try everything else on the menu.
